title: pagaDi hAke
sahitya:
pagaDi hAke pOri triguNagaLella mAri


caraNam 1    nEmada sIreyanuTTi ninna kAmada kacceya kaTTu prEmada sajjanaroLage nintu mAtanADONa bAre
    caraNam 2    hindige hOgalu bEDa nI mundage bandu nillu hindina mundina hambala biTTu ondADa ADONa bAre
    caraNam 3    toDeya tereya bEDa ninnoDeyanu nagutAne toDeya teredu tOridare ncikombarella
    caraNam 4    nEma niSTeya nIgi adu sama dAnavAgi jhAma jhAma usiru biDade ADvADONa bAre
    caraNam 5    pagaDi embuvudu alla pugaDi embudu solla pagaDi sogasu purandara viTTlanobba balla
